name: Insult U - LITE Version
description:
Theres nothing worse than when your feeling on top of the world, some idiot comes along and knocks you off with an insult.

So maybe no-one is around to ruin your day?? What next?? Welcome to Insult U

Let the VoiceoverGuy throw something at you to knock that obnoxious contented smile off your silly pathetic little face.

The Voice of The UKRD group of Radio Stations is known for his dry humour and cutting comments and now has his own app to do it to you.

With over 250 High Quality Insults ready to be unleashed on you or your weedy mates. Just push the button and let the Voice tell it how it is!

*** More great apps available ***

Produced by
http://www.VoiceoverGuy.co.uk
http://www.AppStyle.co.uk
